result.execSummary:
The defendant Ricardo A. Holloway was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Ricardo A. Holloway is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Ricardo A. Holloway was found guilty of Possession of Narcotic Drugs [Modifiers: Second and Subsequent Offense], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(am).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Concurrent with 15CF1102, but Consecutive to 12CF2772, 13CF808, 13CF2880
Court allows Deft may be transferred to another Institution

superMiscConds.notes: $518 DOC Collect within first 12 months after Release to Extended Supervision;  If discharged from extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ricardo A. Holloway

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Ricardo A. Holloway in court in custody with attorney Anthony C. Delyea.  Anthony C. Delyea appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deft pleads Guilty freely and voluntarily; Court accepts plea and finds Deft Guilty; Court orders: 7 years bifurcated sentence: 5 years WSPrison, 2 years Extended Supervision; Concurrent with 115CF1102; Costs DOC Collect;

Defendant Ricardo A. Holloway in court in custody with attorney Anthony C. Delyea.  Perry L Folts appeared with Katharine Buker for the State of Wisconsin.  Status conference scheduled for August 31, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

AND MOTION FOR TIME TO FILE ADDITIONAL PRE-TRIAL MOTIONS

Defendant Ricardo A. Holloway in court in custody with attorney Anthony C. Delyea.  Anne Theresa Nack appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Information filed, copy to defendant, penalties and rights given, reading waived.  Defendant stands mute, not guilty plea entered by court,  Calendar call scheduled for August 13, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Ricardo A. Holloway in court in custody with attorney Anthony C. Delyea.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Testimony taken; Court finds probable cause and binds Defendant over for filing of an Information.  Arraignment scheduled for July 7, 2015 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Ricardo A. Holloway in court in custody with attorney Jason Mitchel Daane.  Katharine Buker appeared with Intern Christa Johnson for the State of Wisconsin.  Complaint filed, copy to Defendant, penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Continued Preliminary Hearing 07-01-2015 at 8:45am c/c Barton, JAR
